text: taruvata a iddarilo okame siggupadutu mellaga atani vaddaku vacci ila annadi: "Vastavaniki na tandri - nivu ma koraku (ma pasuvulaku) niru trapinci nanduku - pratiphalamivvataniki, ninnu pilustunnadu." Atanu, atani vaddaku poyi tana vrttantanni vinipincadu. Appudatanu annadu: "Nivu e matram bhayapadaku. Nivu durmarga prajala nundi vimukti pondavu
